source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_SEQ_00<tab>Raubahn knows exactly what he would like you to do.
target: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_SEQ_00<tab>カストルム・オリエンスのラウバーンは、作戦について考えているようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_SEQ_01<tab>Having resolved to carry out Vice Marshal Tarupin's plan to destroy prototype magitek weapons, General Aldynn is eager to begin at once. He bids you lie in wait for an imperial patrol near Castrum Oriens and slaughter the soldiers in order to goad the Garleans into a response.
target: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_SEQ_01<tab>反帝国活動に賛同する者を募るため、エオルゼア同盟軍とアラミゴ解放軍で、帝国の新兵器を撃破することになった。ラウバーンから帝国の偵察兵を倒すよう頼まれた。ギラバニア辺境地帯のベロジナ川周辺にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA39301 /var>」で見渡して、現れた帝国兵を討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_SEQ_02<tab>The trap has been baited with dead imperials. Raubahn and the others are already in position, waiting for you and the prototype weapons to arrive.
target: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_SEQ_02<tab>帝国兵を討伐した。カストルム・オリエンスの南で「ラウバーン」と合流しよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_SEQ_03<tab>The imperial officer charged with overseeing the field testing of the prototype magitek weapons is none other than Grynewaht, the brutish Roegadyn whom you faced on the Carteneau Flats. Needless to say, he is surprised to see you in Gyr Abania, but eager to seize the opportunity for revenge.
target: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_SEQ_03<tab>ラウバーンと合流し、仲間たちと帝国の新兵器を撃破した。イーストエンド混交林に勝鬨を響かせよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_SEQ_04<tab>Though Grynewaht sends wave after wave of imperial soldiers and magitek against you and your comrades, it is not enough. As the smoldering wreck of his beloved weapon belches smoke into the sky, the imperial officer flees, leaving the combined force of Alliance regulars and Resistance fighters to celebrate a momentous victory.
target: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_SEQ_04<tab>エオルゼア同盟軍とアラミゴ解放軍で勝鬨を上げた。イーストエンド混交林の「メ・ナーゴ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_SEQ_05<tab>The operation is a resounding success. Not only were the imperials humiliated and their magitek destroyed, but your allies suffered no casualties in the process. Thoroughly satisfied with this outcome, Commander Kemp and General Aldynn exchange a few words before withdrawing to their respective headquarters.
target: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_SEQ_05<tab>メ・ナーゴと話した。彼女は冒険者の戦いぶりを目にし、いたく感動しているようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_TODO_00<tab>Lie in wait for imperial soldiers.
target: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_TODO_00<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA39301 /var>で見渡して帝国兵を討伐
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_TODO_01<tab>カストルム・オリエンス南でラウバーンと合流
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_TODO_02<tab>カストルム・オリエンス南でラウバーンと合流

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_ALISAIE_000_001<tab>Prototype magitek armor, eh? This may prove a challenge.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_ALISAIE_000_001新兵器が相手か……。
腕がなるわね。

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_PIPIN_000_015<tab>Fate has a way of leading one into the most unexpected alliances, does it not?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_PIPIN_000_015こうしてギラバニアの地で、
轡（くつわ）を並べて戦うことになろうとは……。
人生、何があるかわからぬな。

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_000_020<tab>We've been careful to avoid needless shows of force this side of the Wall. But that's all about to change─and when it does, you may be sure they'll send their new toys out to entertain us.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_000_020貴様たちも力を貸してくれるのだな？
ありがたい、感謝するぞ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_000_021<tab>I <var 1A 02 /var>would<var 1A 01 /var> ask you to participate in this operation...but from that look I see it is a foregone conclusion. My thanks.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_000_021早速だが、ひとつ頼みたいことがある。
例の新兵器とやらを誘い出すために、エサを撒いてほしいのだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_000_022<tab>Per Pipin's plan, we need to turn East End into an imperial graveyard. You're a dab hand at this, and I'd be a fool not to use you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_000_022わざと敵の偵察兵に見つかるよう派手に動き、
エオルゼア同盟軍が動き始めたと、帝国軍に教えてやるのだよ。
そうすれば、必ず新兵器を差し向けてくるはずだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_000_023<tab>Head to this spot on your map─right here, aye. A patrol should be along shortly. Deal with them, then rendezvous with the rest of us at this location. Go well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_000_023各人の地図に担当地域を記しておく。
その範囲内を動き回り、帝国の偵察兵を倒してくれ。
その後、待ち伏せ地点で落ち合おう……頼んだぞ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_000_025<tab>You know what to do. Be messy, be loud, and rejoin us when you've finished.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_000_025せいぜい派手に動き回ってくれ。
大物を釣り上げてやろうではないか！

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_ALISAIE_000_040<tab>My information was inaccurate, it would seem. The patrol never came...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_ALISAIE_000_040私の担当地区には、偵察兵の姿はなくてね……。
ちょっと拍子抜けだったわ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_PIPIN_000_045<tab>We will have Flames and Adders with us for this operation. The Maelstrom and the Temple Knights will wait in reserve at the castrum.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_PIPIN_000_045今回の作戦では、我ら不滅隊とグリダニアの双蛇党が、
前衛部隊を務めることになった。
黒渦団と神殿騎士団には、拠点の防衛に回ってもらっている。

TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_000_050戻ったな……。
こちらも仕込みは完了している。

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_000_051<tab>Our scouts report that a unit escorting the prototype weapons has left Castellum Velodyna. The Resistance is already in position, so we have but to wait for our guests to arrive.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_000_051アラミゴ解放軍の部隊にも、待ち伏せ地点は伝達済みだ。
あとは新兵器とやらが、実戦テストのために出てくるのを、
狩人のように辛抱強く待とうではないか。

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_GRYNEWAHT_100_060<tab>He who fights and runs─ What the─? Who in the hells are you lot!?
target: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_GRYNEWAHT_100_060<tab>逃げるが勝ちって……な、なんだ、お前たちは～！

TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_MNAAGO_100_061我らアラミゴ解放軍！！
祖国奪還のため、ここで沈んでもらうわ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_000_060<tab>Well done, all of you. I'd call this operation a resounding success.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_000_060よし、作戦完了だ。
敵の部隊長を取り逃がしたようだが、
ほぼ完璧な勝利と言って、差し支えないだろう。

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_CONRAD_000_061<tab>Can't say I'm surprised. The “Bull of Ala Mhigo” had an impressive military record before he went west, as I recall.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_CONRAD_000_061さすがは「戦場の演出家」と謳われた猛将……
ラウバーン殿の指揮ぶりに感服いたしましたぞ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_000_062<tab>Credit where it's due, Master Kemp. 'Twas Marshal Tarupin who made this plan, and all of you, Resistance and Alliance alike, who carried it out to perfection.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_000_062褒められるべきは、作戦を立案したピピンの方でありましょう。
何よりこの勝利は、同盟軍のみならず、解放軍の方々、
そして「暁」と英雄殿、それぞれの奮戦によるものであります。

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_CONRAD_000_063<tab>Aye, that they did. Not a single casualty, for which I'm grateful beyond words. I've no doubt our comrades back at the Reach will feel the same.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_CONRAD_000_063うむ、犠牲を怖れず戦った、すべての者たちに感謝しよう。
無事に最初の共同作戦が成功し、喜ばしいかぎりじゃ。
今後とも、手を取り合って戦いましょうぞ。

source:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_CONRAD_000_065It's been a pleasure, General. Until the next battle.
M'naago─I leave the Scions in your care.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_CONRAD_000_065それでは、ワシらは一足先に帰還するゆえ、
メ・ナーゴ、「暁」の方々の案内は任せるぞ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_000_066<tab>We shall return to the castrum, then. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Mistress Leveilleur─once more you have my thanks. As Master Kemp said, until the next battle.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_000_066では、我らも撤収する。
)) (( )) 02 /var>、「暁」の協力に感謝するぞ。
またいずれ、共に戦場を駆けようではないか。

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_ALISAIE_000_070<tab>That brute of an imperial officer was a force to be reckoned with, wasn't he? A fool, mayhap, but he held his own against the Flame General...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_ALISAIE_000_070あの緑色の鎧を着た帝国軍の将校だけど、
なんだかんだで、ラウバーン局長の猛攻に耐えてたわよね。
どれだけ頑丈なのかしら……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_MNAAGO_000_080<tab>I'd heard the stories, but to actually see you in action... I almost found myself pitying the imperials. Seriously, though─it was inspirational.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_MNAAGO_000_080噂に聞いていた)) (( )) 02 /var>さんの戦いぶり、
生で見ることができて、ちょっと感動しちゃいました。

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_MNAAGO_000_081<tab>Ah, but you must be tired of hearing that, eh? I'll keep it simple, then─thanks for the help out there!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_MNAAGO_000_081って、それよりも、お礼が先ですよね。
今回は作戦まで手伝っていただいて、ありがとうございました！

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_000_090<tab>'Twas a good battle, and we have much to show for it. Pipin should be proud─I know I am.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_000_090完全に策がはまってくれたな。
ピピンの立てた作戦を勝利で飾ることができ、
義父としては、一安心といったところだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_PIPIN_000_091<tab>We couldn't have done it without you. Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Thank you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_PIPIN_000_091よくぞ作戦を成功させてくれた。
感謝するぞ……！

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_BATTLETALK_001_001<tab>Adders, Flames, deal with the escort! Leave the armor to <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_BATTLETALK_001_001)) (( )) 02 /var>には、新型魔導兵器を任せる！
護衛の雑魚どもを蹴散らしつつ、攻撃してくれ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_GRYNEWAHT_BATTLETALK_001_002<tab>Bugger me! Is that General Aldynn!? Bwahahaha! A chance to get my revenge on <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and test our new weapons, <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> kill an Alliance commander! Ohhh, it doesn't get much better than this!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_GRYNEWAHT_BATTLETALK_001_002あのイカつい男は、不滅隊の「ラウバーン」だな？
敵軍の大将を倒して、出世してやるど！

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_ALISAIE_BATTLETALK_001_003<tab>One would almost think he harbored a grudge against you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Whatever did you do to him?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_ALISAIE_BATTLETALK_001_003なんだか、最高に暑苦しいのが出てきたわね……。
)) (( )) 02 /var>、アレって、あなたの知り合い？

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_GRYNEWAHT_BATTLETALK_001_004<tab>Hurry up and KILL THE BASTARDS! We've got 'em outnumbered!
target: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_GRYNEWAHT_BATTLETALK_001_004<tab>ムキ～ッ！　もっともっと増援を投入するど！

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_GRYNEWAHT_BATTLETALK_002_001<tab>What are you idiots doing? Give them everything we've got!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_GRYNEWAHT_BATTLETALK_002_001まだまだ、戦力はあるんだど！
どんどん出せ出せ～！

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_ALISAIE_BATTLETALK_002_002<tab>There's no end to them... I'm here if you need healing, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_ALISAIE_BATTLETALK_002_002次から次へとよくもまぁ……。
)) (( )) 02 /var>、回復が必要なら私の側に来て！

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_BATTLETALK_002_003<tab>Looks like there's only the one prototype. Whatever else we do this day, I want it destroyed!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_BATTLETALK_002_003目標は、あくまでも新型魔導兵器の撃破だ！
)) (( )) 02 /var>、優先して攻撃してくれ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_GRYNEWAHT_BATTLETALK_003_001<tab>Enough! We have secret weapons of great power, don't we? Let's bloody well use 'em!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_GRYNEWAHT_BATTLETALK_003_001ぐぬぬぬぬ……戦力では、こちらが上のハズなのに……
こうなったら、例の新武装を使うど！！

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_ALISAIE_BATTLETALK_003_002<tab>On your guard, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! He's up to something!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_ALISAIE_BATTLETALK_003_002)) (( )) 02 /var>、気を付けて！
何か仕掛けてくるつもりみたいよ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_BATTLETALK_003_003<tab>Keep it up, lads! That thing won't take much more!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_BATTLETALK_003_003よし、新型魔導兵器への攻撃は、確実に効いているぞ！
この調子で攻めるのだ、)) (( )) 02 /var>！

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_GRYNEWAHT_BATTLETALK_004_001<tab>Damn it all! Haven't we got anything else!? More armor or weapons or something!?
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_GRYNEWAHT_BATTLETALK_004_001ぬおおおお……マズい、マズいど！
残りの戦力も全部出せ～い！

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_BATTLETALK_004_002<tab>More of them!? I'm going to have to have a word with our scouts...
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_BATTLETALK_004_002まだ戦力を残していたか……
だが、ここを乗り越えれば我らの勝利ぞ！

TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_GRYNEWAHT_BATTLETALK_005_001アババババ……マズい、マズいど！
ここは、いったん退くど！

TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_BATTLETALK_005_003いいタイミングだ！
これで挟撃は成った、一気に挽きつぶせ！

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_GRYNEWAHT_BATTLETALK_005_004<tab>You think you've won, eh? Heh heh heh... THEN WE GO TOGETHER!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_GRYNEWAHT_BATTLETALK_005_004こ、こうなったら、死なばもろとも……
新兵器ごと全員まとめて吹き飛ばしてやるど！

TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_MAGITEKVANGUARD_BATTLETALK_005_005デストロイモード起動……
自爆実行マデ60秒……。

source: TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_BATTLETALK_005_006<tab>Seven hells! There's no time to get to safety! We must disable it before it blows!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_RAUBAHN_BATTLETALK_005_006今から撤退していたのでは間に合わん！
自爆する前に、集中攻撃を加えて新型魔導兵器を破壊せよ！

source:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_MAGITEKVANGUARD_BATTLETALK_005_009Initiating self-destruct in:
Five... Four... Three... Two... One...
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_GRYNEWAHT_BATTLETALK_005_010<tab>No... No, no, NO! My secret weapon!
target:
TEXT_STMBDA113_02453_GRYNEWAHT_BATTLETALK_005_010そそそ、そんな馬鹿な～！
オラの新兵器がやられちまったど～！
